mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id, a.user_password, a.permission_id, a.user_name, a.birth_date, a.sex, a.email, a.phone, a.department_id, a.class_id, a.admission_date, a.sticker, b,department_name, c.class_name FROM user_info a LEFT JOIN department b ON a.department_id = b.department_id LEFT JOIN class_info c ON a.class_id = c.class_id WHERE a.permission_id = '2'
